feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-19T18:01:37.741484Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;早期欧洲人食用海藻已有数千年</stitle>; <id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/early-europeans-ate-seaweed-and- Aquatic-plants-180983102/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T16:00:20.477559Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/early-europeans- ate-seaweed-and-aquatic-plants-180983102/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://th-thumbnailer.cdn-si-edu.com/iUvedrLUoAaD7M3V17yCDgC4mLs=/1000x750/filters:no_upscale():focal(2900x1933:2901x1934)/https ://tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag-media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/d3/44/d344e243-9e53-4d20-acdf-bb30d305bd8d/gettyimages-1407702607.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;通过分析牙菌斑化石，科学家发现了早期欧洲人食用海藻和其他水生植物的新证据。结果表明，早期人类早在中石器时代就开始食用水生植物了，通过新石器时代到中世纪早期。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#early-europeans-ate-seaweed-for-thousands-of-years" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37943843" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究人员在 14,300 年树龄树轮中发现了有史以来最大的太阳风暴</stitle>; <id>;https: //phys.org/news/2023-10-largest-solar-storm-ancient-year-old.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T16:00:20.480243Z</更新>; <link href= “https://phys.org/news/2023-10-largest-solar-storm-ancient-year-old.html”/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023 /researchers-identify-l-4.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;一个国际科学家小组通过分析在法国阿尔卑斯山发现的古老树木年轮，发现 14,300 年前放射性碳水平大幅上升。今天类似的太阳风暴对于现代技术来说将是灾难性的社会——可能会摧毁电信和卫星系统，导致大规模电网停电，并给我们造成数十亿英镑的损失。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#researchers-identify-largest-ever-solar-storm -in-14300-year-old-tree-rings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944269" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建您的自己的 BitTorrent</stitle>; <id>;https://app.codecrafters.io/courses/bittorrent/overview</id>; <updated>;2023-10-19T11:00:20.480789Z</updated>; <link href=" https://app.codecrafters.io/courses/bittorrent/overview"/>; <author>; <name>;romac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=romac</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://app.codecrafters.io/assets/8b0fe36bdca6ee1ce18f.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;为经验丰富的工程师设计的真实熟练项目。通过从头开始重新创建流行的开发工具来开发软件工艺。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#build-your -own-bittorrent" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37941075" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;由 eBPF 提供支持的 Linux 运行时安全代理</stitle >; <id>;https://github.com/Exein-io/pulsar</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T14:00:20.481389Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com /Exein-io/pulsar"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ExeinTech</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ExeinTech</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Exein-io/pulsar/main/assets/pulsar-logo-black.png#gh-light-mode-only" style="width: 220 像素； height: 89px;" />;<br />;Pulsar 是一款用于在运行时监控 Linux 设备活动的安全工具，由 eBPF 提供支持。它使用 eBPF 探针从内核收集事件，并具有模块化设计，可以轻松定制以及规则创建。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linux-runtime-security-agent-powered-by-ebpf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37942791" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Localsend：开源空投替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/localsend/localsend</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T04:00:20.481895Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/localsend/localsend"/>; <author>; <name>;meatjuice</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=meatjuice</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/16c897c2e10c0728e1eedc4e353fa382e720c818b3f871b912d23b48321b9dad/68747470733 a2f2f6c6f63616c73656e642e6f72672f696d672f73637265656e73686f742d70632e77656270"样式= “宽度：220px； height: 131px;" />;<br />;LocalSend 是一款免费的开源应用程序，可让您通过本地网络与附近的设备安全地共享文件和消息，而无需互联网连接。建议下载该应用程序从应用程序商店或包管理器，因为应用程序没有自动更新。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localsend-open-source-airdrop-alternative" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37938183" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FCC 以 3-2 政党路线投票推进 Title II 网络中立性规则</ stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/10/fcc-moves-ahead-with-title-ii-net-neutrality-rules-in-3-2-party-line-vote /</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T17:00:20.482380Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/10/fcc-moves-ahead-with -title-ii-net-neutrality-rules-in-3-2-party-line-vote/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;NetBeck</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=NetBeck</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/getty-rosenworcel- carr-800x557.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：154px;" />;<br />;美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 已投票决定推进一项恢复网络中立规则并监管互联网服务提供商的计划。该计划将宽带重新归类为电信服务，允许 FCC根据《通信法》第二章监管 ISP。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fcc-moves-ahead-with-title-ii-net-neutrality-rules-in-3-2 -party-line-vote" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944680" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apache HTTP Server 2.4.58 (CVE修复）</stitle>; <id>;https://downloads.apache.org/httpd/CHANGES_2.4.58</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T13:00:20.482888Z</更新>; <link href=" https://downloads.apache.org/httpd/CHANGES_2.4.58"/>; <作者>; <名称>;neustradamus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=neustradamus</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;Apache HTTP Server 2.4.58（CVE 修复）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apache-http-server-2-4-58 -cve-fixes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37941727" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;由于名为 CXL 的鲜为人知的技术</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techradar.com/pro/even-a-laptop-can-run-ram-externally-thanks-to-a-little-known-tech -称为cxl-but-its-not-for-sale-to-mere-mortals-who-only-want-1tb-of-ram</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T17:00:20.483728Z< /更新>; <link href="https://www.techradar.com/pro/even-a-laptop-can-run-ram-externally-thanks-to-a-little-known-tech- Called-cxl- but-its-not-for-sale-to-mere-mortals-who-only-want-1tb-of-ram"/>; <author>; <name>;ashvardanian</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=ashvardanian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/J8B9NVe2MCKkUTgxUACdAE-320-80。 png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;一家初创公司展示了一种设备，可以通过将其插入笔记本电脑来为服务器增加额外的内存。该设备称为 CXL 2.0 交换机，支持 CXL 2.0 和 PCIe Gen 5单芯片标准。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#even-a-laptop-can-run-ram-externally-thanks-to-a-little-known-tech-known- cxl" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944691" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：现代 Moodle 学习平台开源替代方案</ stitle>; <id>;https://www.learnhouse.app/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T08:00:20.484926Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.learnhouse.app /"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sweave</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sweave</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://www.learnhouse.app/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpreview2.a08227bf.png&w=2048&q=100" style="width: 220px; height: 139px;" />;<br />;LearnHouse 是一个开源平台，任何人都可以轻松提供世界一流的教育内容，并提供多种内容类型：动态页面、视频、文档等。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-modern-moodle-learning-platform-open-source-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37939576" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;有一种翻转 DRAM 中位的新方法，它可以对抗最新的防御措施</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/security /2023/10/theres-a-new-way-to-flip-bits-in-dram-and-it-works-against-the-latest-defenses/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T13： 00:20.486102Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/security/2023/10/theres-a-new-way-to-flip-bits-in-dram-and-it-works -against-the-latest-defenses/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;vo2maxer </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vo2maxer</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/data-corruption-800x600.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;研究人员开发了一种名为 RowPress 的新方法，即使有 RowHammer 缓解措施，也可以在 DDR4 内存芯片中创建位翻转。通过使内存的某些区域保持较长时间的开放状态，RowPress 可以诱发位翻转，通过将它们与 RowHammer 访问相结合可以进一步增强位翻转。提高芯片温度也会增强效果。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#there-sa-new-way- to-flip-bits-in-dram-and-it-works-against-the-latest-defenses" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37942114" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;AMD 推出全新 AMD Ryzen Threadripper 7000/Pro 7000 WX</stitle>; <id>;https://ir.amd.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/1162/amd -introduces-new-amd-ryzen-threadripper-7000-series</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T14:00:20.486490Z</更新>; <link href="https://ir.amd.com/ news-events/press-releases/detail/1162/amd-introduces-new-amd-ryzen-threadripper-7000-series"/>; <author>; <name>;diggan</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=diggan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d1io3yog0oux5.cloudfront.net/_d600ce9ad06990652e559410eb88c2a6/amd/db/727/5607/ Social_image_resized.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：115px;" />;<br />;AMD 宣布推出 Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7000 WX 系列处理器，并通过 Ryzen Threadripper 7000 系列处理器重新推出 Threadripper 处理器阵容。PRO 7000 WX 系列处理器提供多达 96 个核心和192 个处理线程，而 7000 系列处理器则具有多达 64 个<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amd-introduces-new-amd-ryzen-threadripper-7000-pro-7000-wx" 目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37942418" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mojo 现已在 Mac 上使用</stitle>; <id>;https:// /www.modular.com/blog/mojo-is-now-available-on-mac</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T14:00:20.486884Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.modular.com/blog/mojo-is-now-available-on-mac"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tosh</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/64174a9fd03969ab5b930a08/653069d3509cead58083d943_2023-10-18_15-45-30.png"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 139px;" />;<br />;Mojo 现已在 Mac 上可用。您可以使用模块化开发者控制台和 Homebrew 包管理器在 Mac 上下载并安装 Mojo SDK。Mojo 通过官方扩展和社区支持 Visual Studio Code成员已经构建了令人惊叹的项目。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mojo-is-now-available-on-mac" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37942574" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Node.js 中的开源后台删除</stitle>; <id>;https://www.npmjs.com/package/ @imgly/background-removal-node</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T09:00:20.487649Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@imgly/background -removal-node"/>; <作者>; <名称>;buss_jan</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=buss_jan</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2702bd345ccd46505878ca2a6fdde53d9ad8cbc86fb027b20f8e203ad036da83/68747470733a2f2f696d672e6c792f73686f77636173 65732f636573646b2f7765622f732f636173652d7468756d626e61696c2f6261636b67726f756e642d72656d6f76616c2f6261636b67726f756e642d726 56d6f76616c2d302e706e673f75746d5f736f757263653d6769746875622675746d5f6d656469756d3d70726f6a6563742675746d5f63616d706169676e 3d62672d72656d6f76616c"样式="宽度：220px； height: 133px;" />;<br />;轻松从 NodeJs 环境中的图像中删除背景，无需额外成本或隐私问题。探索交互式演示。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show -hn-open-source-background-removal-in-node-js" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37940249 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;DALL·E 3 现已在 ChatGPT Plus 和 Enterprise 中提供</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/dall-e-3-is-now-available-in-chatgpt-plus-and -enterprise</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T17:03:20.488443Z</更新>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/dall-e-3-is-now-available- in-chatgpt-plus-and-enterprise"/>; <作者>; <名称>;davidbarker</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davidbarker</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://images.openai.com/blob/f698e023-3373-4385-93f3-f0e0a24adbf0/VALERIECloudAstronaut.png?trim=55%2C0%2C45%2C148&width=1000&quality= 80" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;DALL·E 3 现已在 ChatGPT Plus 和 Enterprise 中提供。它可以从对话中生成独特的图像，并且与前身相比，它提高了视觉质量和细节。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#dall-e-3-is-now-available-in-chatgpt-plus-and-enterprise" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37945452" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mikiphone：首款袖珍电唱机</stitle>; <id>;https://rarehistoricalphotos.com/mikiphone/</id>; <更新>;2023-10 -19T16：00：20.488821Z </更新>; <link href =“https://rarehistoricalphotos.com/mikiphone/”/>; <作者>; <名称>; Brajeshwar </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://rarehistoricalphotos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Mikiphone.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：145px;" />;<br />;Mikiphone 是一款袖珍留声机，人们可以随身携带自己喜欢的音乐。它由匈牙利 Miklós 和 Étienne Vadász 兄弟发明，由 Maison Paillard 制造。与现代音乐设备不同，Mikiphone 无需电池即可运行，依靠手摇曲柄供电。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mikiphone-the-first-pocket-record-player" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944198" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < Entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 托管的恶意广告会导致看似真实的假冒 Keepass 网站</stitle>; <id>;https: //arstechnica.com/security/2023/10/google-hosted-malvertising-leads-to-fake-keepass-site-that-looks-genuine/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T06:00:20.489202 Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/security/2023/10/google-hosted-malvertising-leads-to-fake-keepass-site-that-looks-genuine/"/>; <作者>; <name>;bovem</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bovem</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/warning-800x534.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Google 被发现托管恶意广告，该广告伪装成密码管理器 Keepass 的宣传。点击该广告会进入看似真实的假冒 Keepass 网站，但实际上正在推送恶意软件名为 FakeBat 的家族。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-hosted-malvertising-leads-to-fake-keepass-site-that-looks-genuine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37938866" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;写更多“无用”软件</stitle>; <id>;https://ntietz.com/blog/ write-more-useless-software/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-18T20:00:20.489586Z</更新>; <link href="https://ntietz.com/blog/write-more-useless- software/"/>; <author>; <name>;greenSunglass</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greenSunglass</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;无用的软件是探索和体验计算乐趣的绝佳方式。它使我们能够摆脱义务并确定自己的目标和利益。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#write-more-useless-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37911900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;LocalPilot：MacBook 上的开源 GitHub Copilot</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/danielgross/localpilot</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T10： 00:20.489963Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/danielgross/localpilot"/>; <作者>; <name>;charlieirish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=charlieirish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/2d0f8eeabe56941c85915c39a358212aa86cbcc320698f719db086d1d0f91528/danielgross/localpilot" style="width: 220px;高度：110px；” />;<br />;在我配备 Apple M2 Max 的 Macbook Pro 上，7b 型号的速度大致相同。 34b 型号则不然。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localpilot-open-source-github-copilot-on-your-macbook" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37940572" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“我们有一台连接到互联网的热敏打印机，您可以向我们发送涂鸦”</stitle>; <id>;https://guestbook.goodenough .us/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T12:00:20.490348Z</更新>; <link href="https://guestbook.goodenough.us/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kome< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kome</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是我们的小打印机收到的所有精彩涂鸦的画廊。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#we-have-a- Thermal-printer-hooked-up-to-the-internet-you-can-send-us-a-doodle" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37941234" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NASA 小行星样本含有生命攸关的水和碳</stitle>; <id>; https://phys.org/news/2023-10-nasa-asteroid-sample-life-ritic-carbon.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T16:00:20.490729Z</更新>; <链接href="https://phys.org/news/2023-10-nasa-asteroid-sample-life-ritic-carbon.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a /2023/quotthis-is-the-bigges.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;从45亿年前的小行星贝努采集到的样本含有丰富的水和碳，为地球生命起源于外太空的理论提供了更多证据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nasa-asteroid-sample-contains-life-ritic-water-and-carbon" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944091" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rust 在 WebAssembly 中蓬勃发展（目前）</stitle>; <id>;https://thenewstack.io/rust-is-surging- advance-in-web assembly-for-now/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T16:00:20.491107Z</更新>; <link href="https://thenewstack.io/rust-is-surging- advance-in-web assembly-for-now/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;amalinovic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amalinovic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.thenewstack.io/media/2023/10/62f7c3c1-capture-decran-2023-10-16-173850-1024x390.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：84 像素；” />;<br />;Rust 因其语言支持、计算效率、轻量级特性以及库和 API 的可用性而成为构建 WebAssembly 应用程序和支持基础设施的首选语言。开源社区正在积极致力于解决 WebAssembly 的缺点，并使其更易于其他语言使用。然而，Rust 的复杂性以及对其他语言日益增长的支持可能会阻碍其长期广泛采用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rust-is-surging-ahead-in-web assembly-for-now" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37944101" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Spacedrive：将所有设备和云中的文件统一到一个资源管理器中</stitle>; <id>;https://www.spacedrive.com/</id >; <更新>;2023-10-19T06:00:20.491489Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.spacedrive.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nateb2022 </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nateb2022</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.spacedrive.com/_next/image? url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo.8b13c849.png&w=2048&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;将您的驱动器和云合并到一个数据库中，您可以从任何设备上组织和探索该数据库。专为创作者、囤积者和混乱无序的人而设计。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#spacedrive-unify-files-from-all-your-devices-and-clouds-into-one-explorer" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37934324" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何不雇佣冒充技术人员的朝鲜工厂</stitle>; <id>;https://www. theregister.com/2023/10/19/north_korea_fake_freelance_avoidance/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-19T11:00:20.491883Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/ 10/19/north_korea_fake_freelance_avoidance/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;DougEiffel</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DougEiffel</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/10/19/shutterstock_caution_tape_wrapped_around_man_in_suit.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;美国和韩国当局更新了关于如何避免雇用寻求自由 IT 从业人员身份的朝鲜特工的指南。更新后的建议包括表明自由职业者可能是朝鲜工厂的迹象，例如反复要求预付款、使用货运代理的地址作为公司笔记本电脑的目的地，以及同一身份拥有多个在线资料。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-not-to-hire-a-north-korean-plant-spoke-as-a-techie" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37940713" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
